# Passive Voice Negative Cases (Should Pass)

Each line uses active voice and should NOT trigger a warning.

1. The team implemented the feature last week.
2. The CI pipeline executes tests automatically.
3. A cron job updates the database nightly.
4. We notified users of changes.
5. Reviewers examined the code before merge.
6. The logger records errors to the console.
7. We documented the API in OpenAPI.
8. DevOps deployed changes to production.
9. The server renders the UI.
10. Redis stores the sessions.
11. We applied the migration successfully.
12. The system creates tickets automatically.
13. The update invalidates the cache.
14. The team analyzed the results.
15. The app loads the config at startup.
16. The service publishes events to the queue.
17. The validator checked the schema before save.
18. The alerting system sends notifications via email.
19. A scheduled job generates the report weekly.
20. The middleware checks permissions on every request.
